item.title: Music Industry Moves: Bebe Stockwell Signs With TMWRK and Wasserman
item.description: Folk singer-songwriter Bebe Stockwell, currently on Columbia Records, has signed with TMWRK for management and Wasserman for touring. Andrew McInnes and Nick Palmacci will oversee for TMWRK, Kiely Mos

item.title: Music Industry Moves: WME’s Kirk Sommer Named Musexpo’s International Music Person of the Year
